about.title: Construction company RS-Plat
about.description: A construction company that is rapidly developing in the Ukrainian real estate market. The company was founded by a team of professionals in the field of residential and commercial construction. The successful experience and professionalism of the company's employees have made it possible to create an effective and reliable project management structure, guaranteed work quality, and clear implementation deadlines.
